definition: every day, appropriate for ordinary or routine occasions, a newspaper that is published every day
details:
adverb
- every day
- gradually and progressively
= synonyms: day by day
adjective
- appropriate for ordinary or routine occasions
= synonyms: casual, everyday
- of or belonging to or occurring every day
= example: of or belonging to or occurring every day
= synonyms: day-to-day, day-by-day, day-after-day
noun
- a newspaper that is published every day
